entities.description: The tokenization of traditional assets like treasuries, real estate, and other off-chain assets on blockchain networks. Has matured into a $35+ billion market focused on crypto-native primitives.

mentions.context: RWA DeFi sector has matured beyond simple tokenization to become a $35+ billion market
Market projections suggest tokenized assets could exceed $10 trillion by 2030
The Real-World Asset (RWA) DeFi sector represents a critical bridge between traditional finance and decentralized finance

entities.description: Merchant cash advance marketplace with self-repaying debt mechanism where loan repayment comes from percentage of business sales. Has $16M in deposits with 95% utilization rate.
